name: studenthotel-workspace
description: StudentHotel - A platform connecting students with hotel/hostel services

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t studenthotel-backend ./backend && docker build -t studenthotel-frontend ./frontend
